channel.title: Making Potions Disappear After Being Empty
channel.description:
This is the line I'm looking at: [code]player.getInventory().getItems().set(slot,new Item(dosesLeft > 0 && toPot < pot.id.length ? pot.id[toPot]: 229, 1)); [/code]
Right now, it turns any potion being finished into a vial, but since I have flasks, I just want it to delete it altogether, how do I do that?
